Class ParentPreferencesFragment

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MatchPreferencesFragment, TournamentPreferencesFragment

    public abstract class ParentPreferencesFragment
extends DialogFragment
    Parent class for both PreferencesFragments that implements some common functionality

      • generateTickedBoxes

        public boolean[] generateTickedBoxes(ArrayList<TournyMatchOptions> prefs)
        Makes sure that boxes that were previously ticked in the filtering Fragment stay ticked when it's re-opened
        Parameters:
        prefs - The list of preferences to be used
        Returns:
        An array of booleans representing ticked/unticked state of the options
